title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.15 - Protective shielding from lighting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.15 - Protective shielding from lighting

State Regulations
(a) Lamps located over or within exposed food
storage, food preparation and food display facilities, and facilities where
utensils and equipment are cleaned and stored shall be shielded, coated or
otherwise shatter resistant. (b) Infrared or other heat lamps shall be protected against breakage by a shield
surrounding and extending beyond the bulb, leaving only the face of the bulb
exposed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-7.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
